description:
PulsePro can not only monitor heart rate, test mental health, record blood pressure, blood sugar and blood oxygen, but also output health reports through top AI technology, give advice on maintaining good health and recommend good eating habits.


Here's what makes PulsePro a must-have for your health journey:

- Effortless Heart Rate Monitoring: Simply place your finger on your phone's camera, and PulsePro does the rest. It detects and records your heart rate, providing instant feedback on your vital signs. With PulsePro, monitoring your health is always at your fingertips.


- AI Generated Health Report: Pulse Pro analyzes your health data through the latest AI technology and generates detailed and accurate health reports. AI will also give you advice on staying healthy and recommend good eating habits based on your health condition.


- Comprehensive Blood Pressure and Blood Sugar Tracking: Not only does PulsePro record your blood pressure and blood sugar, but it also presents your data in easy-to-understand charts. Track the latest trends in your health and make informed adjustments to your lifestyle.


- Recipe Week Plan: PulsePro not only provides weekly recipe plans for managing blood pressure, lowering blood sugar, and stabilizing heart rate, but also includes other recipe plans, such as weight loss recipe plans, etc. You can even develop your own exclusive recipes according to your needs plan.Immerse yourself in a week of balanced, nourishing meals with our Recipe Week Plan, and take a significant step towards enhanced health and well-being.


- Timely Health Reminders: Set reminders in PulsePro, and it will prompt you to conduct regular health checks. Staying on track with your health has never been easier.


- Test mental health: Complete a small number of mental health test questions, and PulsePro will analyze your answers through AI, give you mental health results and give you suggestions for maintaining good mental health.


- Food Analysis Guide: You can check the nutritional facts of common foods on PulsePro, and get food recommendations.


- Activity Capability Assessment：PulsePro leverages AI technology to analyze your activity data in depth, generating comprehensive health reports to help you enhance your overall well-being.


- Secure and Private: Protecting user data is our top priority. Our app ensures the privacy and security of all sensitive information, allowing users to confidently Monitor heart rate without worries.


How to Use PulsePro for Heart Rate Measurement:

- Ensure your fingers aren't too cold.

- Cover the camera lens and flash completely with your fingertip.

- Press gently – applying too much pressure can reduce blood flow and affect accuracy.


Important Notice:

- PulsePro is not designed for medical purposes.

- The app can only measure heart rate, but not blood pressure or blood sugar level.

- It serves as a source of general health information for recording purposes only.

- Always consult your doctor with any health concerns.


PulsePro is connected to HealthKit to sync and analyze your daily data.


You can subscribe to get access to all the services offered by the app.


By using this app, you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:

Terms of Service: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Cps3-_GpShbn-4MfTyVj6_D4agzVpzNYVolmSqHqF4U/edit?usp=sharing


Privacy Policy: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OHxbnhNvMtFCetiQFsTE5B1cRCjIcgFRhMtoi39cpH4/edit?usp=sharing


Contact us: davidxie@xingyuantechnology.com


Experience the ease of monitoring your health with PulsePro – your partner in maintaining wellness.

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Whether you're going through hard times, need an extra push to get stuff done, or like sharing inspirational quotes on social media, Motivation has you covered.

Positive reminders are one of the simplest and most powerful tools for mental growth. It’s all about keeping the right thoughts top of mind from the get-go every day, so they’re readily available on those hard days when you need them most.

Now, from iOS 14, you can think positive thoughts without even trying with the Motivation widget! Simply install the widget in your home screen and customize it from the app. You can have as many widgets as you want!

Customize the design of the quotes and share the uplifting message of the day with your friends, or use the image for Instagram or as a wallpaper.

The app includes a wide range of topics such as self-esteem, relationships, and dealing with stress, as well as a selection of carefully designed themes to choose from - updated frequently.

+ Read through Hundreds of Quotes
+ Find Motivational Books
+ Save or Share your Quotes
+ Set Motivational Reminders throughout the Day
+ Save your Favorite Quotes
+ Change Font and Colors
+ Filter Quotes by Category
+ Set a Home Screen Motivation Widget

From quotes about working out to love and family quotes, Motivation has them all! Browse thousands of quotes organized by category:


- Motivation to work harder
- Love quotes
- Motivation to train and work out
- Help for depression
- Boost your self-esteem and self-confidence
- Get over a break up
- Life lessons and sayings
- Sports quotes from athletes and trainers
- Business, money, success, and career
- Being present and mindful
- Quotes from and for women
- Philosophy from the best minds
- Quotes to be thankful for what you got
- Inspirations for joy
- Quotes from movies
- Verses from the Bible
- And much more!

And now with Motivation Premium you can:


+ Remove ads
+ Unlock all themes and categories
+ Set background photo
+ Get unlimited reminders
+ Search quotes

To get access to the Motivation Premium content and functionality, you can choose between a lifetime, monthly, and yearly auto-renewable subscription. This is a recurring transaction that will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged at the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.


Find tons of inspiring content on our blog: https://blog.motivation.app/

Looking to build muscle and lose weight? Home Workout has got you covered!
Home workouts with no equipment, easy to follow.
Follow the tailored workout plans and expert guidance to meet a fitter, stronger you!

Home Workout app is an expertly crafted fitness app that offers a variety of workouts and workout plans suitable for everyone, from fitness beginners to experts.

With no equipment required, you can start workouts anytime, anywhere– whether you're at home, in the gym, or outdoors.

And that's not all! Home Workout also provides personalized workout plans tailored to your individual needs, whether your aim is to build muscle, lose weight, or simply stay fit.

Plus, with a real-time workout tracker, your training data will be automatically recorded and you'll never miss a single workout progress. So why wait? Time to get ready to transform your body today with Home Workout!

Home Workout prioritizes your fitness goals and workout results.
1. START ANYTIME & ANYWHERE
Our easy-to-follow workouts need no equipment. With Home Workout, just tap and start your workout plan anytime, whether at home, in the gym, or outdoors.

2. EXPERT-TAILORED WORKOUT PLAN
Gain muscle, lose weight, or just keep fit - Home Workout provides a personalized workout plan that exactly fits your goals and lifestyle. And the best part? It's fast-acting and produces long-lasting workout results.

Everyone can find the workouts they want here, whether you want to lose fat, target specific muscles, stretch your body, or just get a good mood. Home Workout has got you covered with a variety of targeted workouts.

Get Moving with Home Workout's Highlight Features:
• Personalized Workout Plan just for you: Tailored to your fitness goals & focus areas, and get faster workout results.
• 500+ Varied Workouts: A wide variety of workouts and exercises that cater to your every individual needs.
• Smart Fitness Tracker: Automatically record your workout progress and help you stay on track.

Other Can't-Miss Features:
• Pro Workout Video Guides: Work out effectively, prevent injury, and get inspired.
• Apple Health Integration: Seamlessly integrate your fitness data (calories, steps…) for better workout progress tracking
• Clear Workout Data Charts: Track weight and calorie trends for informed decisions.
• Customized Reminders: Never miss a training session or daily workout goal.
• Share with friends: Inspire and get inspired.

No Hidden Charges, say goodbye to unexpected "surprises".

Momiary: Pregnancy Tracker & Health Guide for Moms-to-Be
Take charge of your pregnancy journey with Momiary — a comprehensive app designed to support expecting moms with smart tracking tools, health insights, and expert-backed advice for every week of your pregnancy.

Whether you're planning, expecting, or already navigating symptoms, Momiary is your private, powerful companion.

Top Features of Momiary: Pregnancy & Period Tracker

1. Period & Ovulation Tracking

Stay in tune with your cycle: track periods, predict ovulation, and identify your fertile days.
View cycle patterns and get reminders tailored to hormonal changes.
Built-in ovulation calculator for accurate fertility prediction.
2. Pregnancy Health Monitoring

Log daily weight and symptoms like nausea, fatigue, or cravings.
Visualize your health trends with charts and analytics.
Receive daily advice based on your pregnancy stage and symptoms.
3. Week-by-Week Pregnancy Guide

Know what’s happening each week with a breakdown of baby’s development.
Fun comparisons like “baby’s size as a fruit” to track growth.
Countdown to your due date and access regular check-up tips.
4. Maternal Wellness & Lifestyle Tools

Get curated nutrition tips and mental wellness guidance.
Kegel exercise reminders to support pelvic health.
Browse name ideas and prepare for baby without stress.
Why Moms Love Momiary

Privacy-First Design: Your data stays on your device. No tracking, no third-party access.
Medical-Grade Content: Built on trusted health recommendations for moms and moms-to-be.
User-Focused: No overwhelming baby features – just smart tools for your well-being.
From irregular cycles to postpartum prep, Momiary helps you stay informed, healthy, and confident every step of the way.

Our Commitment to Data Privacy

Momiary does not collect or store your personal health data. Everything stays on your phone. Your journey, your data — always private.

Download Momiary Today
Start your pregnancy journey with support, clarity, and confidence. All-in-one care, made just for you.

MyNHIS app will allow users without an NHIS membership to register for membership using their Ghana Card. MyNHIS app allows NHIS members to manage their membership status and details. In addition, users can access a list of NHIS credentialed health facilities, medicines list, and benefit package.

My Calendar – Period Tracker by Simple Innovation is an elegant and easy-to-use period tracker that helps you take control of the many aspects of your menstrual cycle — from ovulation, fertility and periods, to birth control pills, moods and other symptoms.

Whether you are concerned about conceiving, birth control and contraception, or regularity of period cycles, Period Calendar can help. Our tracker is easy to use and offers everything you need: Track irregular periods, weight, temperature, moods, blood flow, symptoms and more.

Be PREPARED for your PERIOD:
- MAKE PLANS for rest and work
- Be CONFIDENT about your HEALTH. Add information to the app, use it to answer your doctor’s questions.
- Note SYMPTOMS, get insights. Use the charts to track changes.
- Track OVULATION and FERTILITY dates. 
- Keep your data SECRET. Use pin-code, face-ID or a fingerprint to keep the data safe.
- Take PILLS on time. Use reminders so you don't miss your pill time.

Discreet reminders keep you informed and prepared by predicting upcoming periods, ovulation, and fertile days. The app adapts to your cycle history and the calculator accurately predicts the important events during your cycle.

Key features:
- Vital info at a glance: intuitive calendar home page lets you visualize non-fertile, fertile, ovulation, expected period and actual period
- Entire cycle log and settings can be backed up and restored easily and quickly. Never be afraid to lose your calendar data, even when you lost your phone or get a new one.
- Detailed tracking: daily planner lets you save essential period information like flow, intercourse, symptoms, moods, temperature, weight, medicine, PMS, other cervical observations, and general diary notes
- Always stay in the loop with notifications for upcoming period, fertility windows or ovulation
- Protect your most private data from curious eyes: password lock it using a unique PIN code
- Personalize and make it yours: Gorgeous new watercolor themes, adjust period prediction intervals, luteal phase length, plus choose your units of measure and the first day of the week (Sunday or Monday) – all in Settings
- Abstinence mode hides ovulation, fertility and intercourse related data—perfect tracker for girls and teens just starting their periods
- Want to start fresh? Just reset it

You can track changes and symptoms during perimenopause, such as hot flashes, night sweats, mood swings, and irregular cycles.
Stay in control of your health with personalized insights and reminders tailored for this important life stage.
Whether you are starting to notice irregularities or want extra support, Perimenopause Mode helps you better understand your body and feel prepared every day.

This highly customizable period tracker and pregnancy planning calendar is perfect for any woman to take control of her health and keep organized.

Download it for FREE today!

The Bood Pressure Monitor is a reliable, safe and fast assistant to help you track your blood pressure information and heart pulse, as well as provide useful lifestyle tips for your health. 

The Bood Pressure Monitor app allows you to control your blood pressure, heart rate and other vital signs in a quick, easy, and safe manner. You can easily follow the evolution of your values, understand the meaning of your measurement values, determine if you are at a normal level, and get useful advice on how to improve your lifestyle for better health!

It can be challenging to find all of your blood pressure statistics in one app. The Bood Pressure Monitor can provide you with information on your blood pressure ranges, trends, and other relevant information.

The heart rate is also an important health indicator. You can measure and analyze your stress and anxiety levels with Bood Pressure Monitor. With our app, a pulse checker and heart rate monitor, you can keep track of your stress, anxiety, and emotions. It will assist you in analyzing your stress levels and taking care of your health.

Just use your phone - no specialized device needed!
In-depth analysis with waveform graphs
Health knowledge and insights by experts

DISCLAIMER: 
- The Bood pressure: Heart rate monitor App should not be used as a diagnostic tool for blood or heart diseases.
- The Bood pressure: Heart rate monitor App is not designed to be used in a medical emergency. If you require assistance, please contact your health care physician.
- The Bood pressure: Heart rate monitor App may cause the LED to flash excessively hot in some devices.

Daily workouts only take 10 to 15 minutes, so you don't have to endure the boredom and pain of long-hour exercises.
● From Novice to Expert
Whether you're a fitness novice or an experienced professional, you can find suitable courses through our easy-to-understand guidance. Since everyone's fitness level varies, you should choose exercise methods that match your own ability and pace.
● Work out All Parts of the Body
The courses designed by our fitness experts are aimed at helping you achieve your goals. You can choose a full-body workout or focus on specific body parts, making your training more targeted.
"MuscleMaxme" – The ultimate fitness partner exclusively designed for men, taking you on a personalized fitness journey!
This is a video-based learning platform for fitness enthusiasts. With the help of high-definition video tutorials, professional coaches will demonstrate every movement and explain the key points and details in depth. Even if you're at home, you can enjoy professional gym-level guidance. With daily updated training programs, your fitness journey will always be full of novelty and challenges.
"MuscleMaxme" Automatic Renewal Service Instructions
【"MuscleMaxme"】Enjoy multiple privileges, such as intelligent customized plans, professional assessments, and unlimited access to courses.
【Subscription Cycle】
Continuous Monthly Subscription: The subscription cycle is 1 month.
Continuous Six-Month Subscription: The subscription cycle is 6 months.
Continuous Annual Subscription: The subscription cycle is 12 months.
【Subscription Fees】
Subject to the information of in-App Purchase (iAP). For example, the continuous monthly subscription product costs 48 yuan per month, and the continuous annual subscription product costs 188 yuan per year.
【Payment】
After the user confirms the purchase and makes the payment, the amount will be deducted from the iTunes account.
【Auto-renewal】
The "Continuous Monthly / Annual" products support auto-renewal. After the purchase is confirmed, the fee will be deducted from your iTunes account. Unless you cancel the auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription, the subscription will be automatically renewed. Apple will automatically deduct the fee from the iTunes account within 24 hours before the subscription expires. Upon successful payment, the membership validity period will be extended by one cycle.
【Canceling Auto-renewal】
On your Apple iOS device, open the "App Store" --> Click on the Apple account avatar in the upper right corner --> Enter the "Account" section --> Click on "Subscriptions" --> Select "MuscleMaxme" and cancel the subscription.

Whisperly turns restless nights into restful ones.
It’s your gentle, all-in-one companion for better sleep: use intelligent sleep track to understand how you slept, spot early warning signs that disturb your rest, and ease into the night with soothing sounds and guided meditation that help you relax.

What you get
• Intelligent sleep track – Capture time to fall asleep, total sleep, wake-ups, wake time, and more so you can see what really happened each night.
• Early pattern alerts – Get timely hints when your sleep rhythm shows potential issues (like frequent brief wake-ups or long sleep latency).
• Clear, visual reports – Readable nightly summaries plus weekly/monthly trends that highlight changes and point to possible next steps.
• Soothing sounds library – White noise, nature, ambient music, and gentle atmospheres. Mix your favorites, set a timer, and use fade in/out for a calm landing into sleep.
• Meditation & relax practices – Short breathing, body scan, and light guided sessions to lower arousal, calm the mind, and make drifting off easier.
• Bedtime ritual & reminders – Build a consistent pre-sleep routine and stabilize your body clock with friendly nudges.

Why Whisperly
 • From data to direction – Not just “how you slept,” but simple insights into why and what you can try next.
 • Low effort, high clarity – No complex setup. Open, use, and start learning from night one.
 • Designed for anyone who struggles with sleep – Trouble falling asleep, light sleep with frequent waking, early rising, jet lag recovery, or stress-driven fluctuations.

Friendly note
Whisperly supports healthy habits and better sleep awareness. It does not provide medical diagnosis or treatment. If you experience persistent or serious sleep concerns, please consult a healthcare professional.

Start tonight. Understand your sleep, feel the relax, and let Whisperly guide you back to deeper rest.

Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Step up your fitness game with Sweatcoin! 

Looking for a fun way to boost your fitness & get rewarded? Sweatcoin, the viral walking app, is here to transform your steps into real-world rewards! Earn Sweatcoins with every step you take and redeem them for exclusive gadgets, sports gear, and amazing experiences in our marketplace! 

The more you walk, the more you earn! And the more you earn, the more you walk! 


Discover the benefits:

- Effortless step tracking: Sweatcoin’s pedometer runs smoothly in the background, tracking your steps accurately without draining your battery. It’s your perfect fitness companion, whether you’re walking, running, or working out at home.

- Unlock rewards: Use your sweatcoins to access incredible offers and discounts that you won’t find anywhere else. Your fitness journey has never been so rewarding!

- Get moving, get badges: Hit your daily step goals and collect unique badges for each milestone achieved.

- Calling all streak masters: Compete with friends to see who can maintain the longest step streak. Fitness is more fun with a little friendly competition!


Features

Privacy first: We use a secure, proprietary algorithm to count your steps. Your location and personal data stay private—only you have access to your information.
Pedometer: Accurate step tracking with minimal battery usage.
Device compatibility: Available on iOS devices. Apple Watch users can also enjoy Sweatcoin.

Focus, relax, and sleep through the power of sound. Endel creates AI-powered sounds designed to support your everyday life. Backed by science, and enjoyed by millions worldwide.

Endel is powered by its patented core AI technology. It takes inputs like location, environment, and heart rate, to create the optimal personalized soundscape. This happens on the fly and allows Endel to reconnect your state with your circadian rhythm.

Get access to the following classic soundscapes at home, work, or on the move to relax, concentrate, and minimize distractions and brain fatigue:


• Focus – boosts your productivity by helping you concentrate for longer

• Sleep – soothes you into a deep sleep with soft, gentle sounds

• Relax – calms your mind to create feelings of comfort and safety

• Move – feel grounded and present while walking, hiking, or running


ENDEL PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION


Alongside the classics, the Premium package contains the following Endel Soundscapes and features:

• Colored Noise – choose one of 9 colors of noise to focus, relax, sleep, and mask outside sound

• Study – improves concentration and keeps you calm while studying or working

• Dynamic Focus – get your perfect productivity support with real-time sound tuning

• Hibernation – nourish your ears with cozy sounds for cold-season slumber

• Nature Elements – nurture the mind with sounds of nature, your way

• Rainy Outside – cozy up to the gentle patter of rain, blended with sleep-aiding sounds

• Recovery – revives your wellbeing with sounds engineered to lower anxiety

• Spatial Orbit – venture into a more peaceful dimension with an immersive Spatial Audio experience

• Focus Timer – the famous interval work method, upgraded with science-backed Focus sounds


On top of the much-loved original Endel soundscapes, Endel works with innovative artists and thinkers to create unique experiences. These collaborative Endel Soundscapes are available for Premium users:


• James Blake: Wind Down – prepare your body for sleep with soothing sounds from an award-winning artist

• Grimes: AI Lullaby – supports sleep for babies and adults with original sounds and vocals from Grimes

• Plastikman: Deeper Focus – a deep focus techno soundscape created with Richie Hawtin

• Alan Watts: Wiggly Wisdom – soothing and motivation spoken word soundscape, infused with the playful wisdom from Alan Watts

• Miguel: Clarity Trip – elevate your every step with original sounds from Miguel

Endel Pacific is the patented technology that powers our apps and integrations. 

All soundscapes are available offline.

Apart from the Premium sounds and features, Endel Premium users get access to the exclusive Apple Podcast shows.


SUBSCRIPTION TERMS


Skip the payment screen by tapping “X” in the top-right corner of the offer. The Free Edition of Endel will start automatically.

You can get access to Endel Premium by subscribing to a recurrent plan of your choice or with a one-time Lifetime purchase.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Payment will be charged to your Apple account at confirmation of purchase.

Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
